guide.introduction:
Conductive-thread ribbon cable is the perfect material for wiring wearables because it can be attached just like normal fabric ribbons; it's flexible, sewable and washable.

You can easily use conductive-thread ribbon cable by connecting it with FFC connectors.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Conductive-thread ribbon cable is the perfect material for wiring wearables because it can be attached just like normal fabric ribbons; it's flexible, sewable and washable.

You can easily use conductive-thread ribbon cable by connecting it with FFC connectors.

Relevant parts
  • conductive thread ribbon cable
  • Flexible Flat Cable (FFC) connectors
Tools
  • Pliers

lines.text: conductive thread ribbon cable (can buy from Adafruit / SparkFun)
lines.text_raw: conductive thread ribbon cable  (can buy from [http://www.adafruit.com/products/1139|Adafruit] / [https://www.sparkfun.com/products/11680|SparkFun])

lines.text: FFC connectors (0.100’’ pitch, 4pins, male or female) (can buy from Digi-Key)
lines.text_raw: FFC connectors (0.100’’ pitch, 4pins, male or female)  (can buy from [http://www.digikey.com/product-detail/en/66226-004LF/609-2178-ND/1002493|Digi-Key])

lines.text: Cut the conductive thread ribbon cable to the length you need.
lines.text_raw: Cut the conductive thread ribbon cable to the length you need.

lines.text: Cut out the corners at the ends of the ribbon cable so that it will fit into an FFC connector.
lines.text_raw: Cut out the corners at the ends of the ribbon cable so that it will fit into an FFC connector.

lines.text: Place one end of the ribbon cable between the metal crimping parts of an FFC connector.
lines.text_raw: Place one end of the ribbon cable between the metal crimping parts of an FFC connector.

lines.text: Crimp the FFC connector with pliers.
lines.text_raw: Crimp the FFC connector with pliers.

lines.text: Lock the FFC connector by pressing side edges of the top cover.
lines.text_raw: Lock the FFC connector by pressing side edges of the top cover.

lines.text: Repeat the same to connect the other end of ribbon cable.
lines.text_raw: Repeat the same to connect the other end of ribbon cable.

lines.text: Enjoy the conductive thread ribbon cable!
lines.text_raw: Enjoy the conductive thread ribbon cable!

lines.text: If no current flows through the ribbon cable, check the connectivity of the pins and crimp again.
